steps.name: Checking that input "Email" has a value "user.name@gmail.com"
Checking that input "Username" has a value "username"
Checking that input "Password" has a value "password"
Checking that input "Title" has a value "Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time" to value "2 weeks"
Checking that input "Estimated time" has a value "2 weeks"
Checking that textarea "Textarea" has a value "Playwright"
Checking that input "Max score" has a value "100"
Checking that input "Min score" has a value "10"
Set file "testdata/files/image.png" to the file input "Upload input"
Checking that icon "Upload info icon" is visible
Checking that text "Title" has text "Tap on "Upload image" button to select file"
Checking that text "Description" has text "Recommended file size 540X300"
Checking that button "Upload button" is visible
Checking that button "Remove button" is visible
Checking that image "Preview image" is visible
Check visible course view at index "0"
Checking that text "Max score" is visible
Checking that text "Max score" has text "Max score: 100"
Checking that text "Min score" is visible
Checking that text "Min score" has text "Min score: 10"
Checking that text "Estimated time" is visible
Checking that text "Estimated time" has text "Estimated time: 2 weeks"
Open course menu at index "0" and click edit
Checking that input "Title" has a value "Changed Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time" to value "4 weeks"
Checking that input "Estimated time" has a value "4 weeks"
Checking that textarea "Textarea" has a value "Changed Playwright"
Checking that input "Max score" has a value "50"
Checking that input "Min score" has a value "5"
Check visible course view at index "0"
Checking that text "Title" has text "Changed Playwright"
Checking that text "Max score" is visible
Checking that text "Max score" has text "Max score: 50"
Checking that text "Min score" is visible
Checking that text "Min score" has text "Min score: 5"
Checking that text "Estimated time" is visible
Checking that text "Estimated time" has text "Estimated time: 4 weeks"
